attributes.action: Petition to change the bully breed legislature.
attributes.additional_details: I would like to change the rules regarding the bully breed legislature, making it possible for responsible ownership of said banned dogs like the Pitt bull, Dogo Argentino and the Staffidshore bull terrier although the latter not illegal its is very often mistaken for an illegal breed although all said breeds in the right hands are loyal loving dogs just like any other.
